00032 typedef NITF_BOOL (*NITF_IO_INTERFACE_READ) (NITF_DATA* data,
00033                                              char *buf, size_t size,
00034                                              nitf_Error *error);
00035

00037                                              const char *buf, size_t size,
00038                                              nitf_Error * error);

00041                                               nitf_Off offset, int whence,
00042                                               nitf_Error* error);

00051                                              nitf_Error* error);
00052 
00053 typedef void      (*NITF_IO_INTERFACE_DESTRUCT) (NITF_DATA *);

00055 typedef struct _nitf_IIOInterface
00056 {
00057     NITF_IO_INTERFACE_READ     read;
00058     NITF_IO_INTERFACE_WRITE    write;
00059     NITF_IO_INTERFACE_SEEK     seek;
00060     NITF_IO_INTERFACE_TELL     tell;
00061     NITF_IO_INTERFACE_GET_SIZE getSize;
00062     NITF_IO_INTERFACE_CLOSE    close;
00063     NITF_IO_INTERFACE_DESTRUCT destruct;
00064 }
00065 nitf_IIOInterface;

00070     nitf_IIOInterface* iface;
